member.name: IAppxBundleManifestPackageInfo.GetFileName
member.summary: Retrieves the file-name attribute of the package.
member.param: A string that contains the file name of the package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestPackageInfo.GetOffset
member.summary: Retrieves the offset of the package relative to the beginning of the bundle.
member.param: The offset of the package, in bytes.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestPackageInfo.GetPackageId
member.summary: Retrieves an object that represents the identity of the app package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestPackageInfo.GetPackageType
member.summary: Retrieves the type of package that is represented by the package info.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestPackageInfo.GetResources
member.summary: Retrieves an enumerator that iterates through all the <Resource> elements that are defined in the app package's manifest.
member.param: The enumerator that iterates through the resources.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestPackageInfo.GetSize
member.summary: Retrieves the size of the package, in bytes.
member.param: The size of the package, in bytes.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxBundleManifestPackageInfo
member.summary: Provides a read-only object model for a <Package> element in a bundle package manifest.
